name: Dreizehn: Grim Harvest
description:
Another rough day at work for Dreizehn, the thirteenth Grim Reaper.
Letting clean souls pass on while reaping the wicked, just your every day drudgery.

#ludumDare

How to Play:

  • Use WASD, or the Arrow Keys to move.
  • Attack with mouse buttons or the Spacebar.
  • Let the clean blue Souls pass on without disturbing them.
  • Reap the wicked red Souls to purge them.

Note that some VPN Services seem to cause problems with the Unity Web Build, please make sure to disable them if the game doesn't start!
